tika.dc.description: Malcolm X was an inspirational speaker, an activist and a revolutionary. Born into poverty in 1925 in Nebraska in the US, by the time of his assassination 40 years later he had become one of the most iconic figures of black power. And he remains so today. This addition to the popular Rebel's Guide series follows Malcolm X's political journey and the movements and ideas that influenced it.
